allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$body = @''
From: rix.larry@gmail.com
To: rix.larry@gmail.com
Subject: Test Email from CLI

This is a test.
''@
echo $body
")

Bash(powershell -Command "
$body = @''
From: rix.larry@gmail.com
To: rix.larry@gmail.com
Subject: CLI Test from Claude

Test message body.
''@
echo ''Email body:''
echo $body
echo ''---''
echo ''Running curl with verbose...''
$body | & ''./curl.exe'' --verbose --url ''smtp://smtp.gmail.com:587'' --ssl-reqd --mail-from ''rix.larry@gmail.com'' --mail-rcpt ''rix.larry@gmail.com'' --user ''rix.larry@gmail.com:%SSC_SMTP_PASSWORD%'' -T - 2>&1
echo ''---''
echo ''Exit code:'' $LASTEXITCODE
")

Bash(powershell -Command "
Write-Host ''Testing SMTP connection with current env var...''
Write-Host ''Password length:'' $env:SSC_SMTP_PASSWORD.Length
$body = @''
From: rix.larry@gmail.com
To: rix.larry@gmail.com
Subject: Test from Claude

Test message.
''@
$result = $body | & ''./curl.exe'' --verbose --url ''smtps://smtp.gmail.com:465'' --mail-from ''rix.larry@gmail.com'' --mail-rcpt ''rix.larry@gmail.com'' --user ""rix.larry@gmail.com:$env:SSC_SMTP_PASSWORD"" -T - 2>&1
Write-Host $result
Write-Host ''Exit code:'' $LASTEXITCODE
")
Bash("/c/Program Files/Eiffel Software/EiffelStudio 25.02 Standard/studio/spec/win64/bin/ec.exe" -batch -config simple_showcase.ecf -target run_server -c_compile)
Bash("/c/Program Files/Eiffel Software/EiffelStudio 25.02 Standard/studio/spec/win64/bin/ec.exe" -batch -config simple_showcase.ecf -target generate_site -c_compile)
